title: The.Amazing.Spiderman.2.Rise.Of.Electro.HDCAM.(WithPostCreditSce
description:
YOUKNIGHTED_RG PRESENTS


The Amazing Spiderman 2: Rise Of Electro


Notes:
So, we have two 1080p sources, both cammed at the same showing using Sony Xperia Z and Sony Xperia Z1 devices.
I took the best looking bits out of each one to put together the film.

There is 2 minutes missing.
But it isnt crucial to the story, its just some guy taking harry to the Secret Projects part of Oscorp.

Great film, i recommend going to see this one in 3D.

Its NEVER too dark throughout the film.
Its got a good frame rate.
It WAS shot from a 3D source, so slight bluring here and there should be expected.

In my honest opinion, V/8 A/9 M/9.7


For a first cam, and before US release, you wont get any better than this.


Two samples included from different light scenes.

May take a while to seed through, but be patient.

Should have better speed tonight.

Ill upload a 480p version sometime in the next 6-7 hours.
